      Fields in util declared as Stat 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Stat SubTree.attribute
      The Stat, this SubTree represents.
      private Stat Tree.defaultBonus
      A possible default Bonus, every Tree adds, despite what his children define.

      The Stat, this Item might provide as default bonus for all possible Boni.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns the Stat, this SubTree represents.
      Stat Tree.getDefaultBonus()

      Methods in util that return types with arguments of type Stat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.HashMap<Stat,java.lang.Integer>> MultiBonus.getAllItems()
      A Method, that returns every single Item, that is possible with its' given MultiBonus-Trees as an ArrayList of HashMaps, that resemble the Stats, this Item might have.
      java.util.HashMap<Stat,java.lang.Integer> Item.getStats()
      Returns the Stats, this Item provides when used.
      Methods in util with parameters of type Stat 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds the given Stat as default Bonus for this Item.
      private SubTree MultiBonus.createSubTree(Stat attribute, int lower, int upper)
      Creates a new SubTree for this MultiBonus, that can be added to a Tree.
      Constructors in util with parameters of type Stat 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a SubTree of the given Attribute with the given lower and upper borders.
      Tree(java.lang.String name, SubTree left, SubTree middle, SubTree right, Stat defaultBonus, int amount, double dropChance)
      Creates a new Tree of the given Name with the given SubTrees lefts and right and the chance to drop dropChance.
